title: K2D Foods Recalls Raw Ground Beef Products Due to Possible E. coli O103 Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: Editors note: FSIS and our public health partners, including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and state public health officials, are investigating an E. coli O103 outbreak. Unopened, intact, ground beef collected from a restaurant where multiple case-patients reported dining tested...
impacted_products: Two 24-lb. vacuum-packed packages in cardboard boxes containing raw “GROUND BEEF PUCK” with “Use Thru” dates of 4/14/19, 4/17/19, 4/20/19, 4/23/19, 4/28/19, and 4/30/19.
